FuncDef: This command configures the timed interval after which the server is triggered to send a Hello request message to all clients and force a renegotiation of the symmetric encryption key. When an interval of 0 is configured, the server will never send a hello request message.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interval, in minutes, after which the server is triggered to send a Hello request message. Values-0 to 65000.
